layers.description: Who can do what. AuthN/AuthZ, roles, org boundaries.
layers.name: Identity & Access Control

layers.description: Defines data types, sensitivity, retention, and allowed flows.
layers.name: Data Classification & Handling

layers.description: Ensures use of data matches consent/purpose (education, operations, reporting).
layers.name: Consent & Purpose Limitation

layers.description: Tamper-evident logs, traceability, evidence for audits and disputes.
layers.name: Audit Logging & Evidence

layers.description: Central place where enforceable policy checks live and are versioned.
layers.name: Policy Engine & Rules

layers.description: Assigns risk levels to actions/agents; triggers throttling/quarantine.
layers.name: Risk Engine & Scoring

layers.description: Prevents authority creep; enforces decision levels and non-delegable actions.
layers.name: Alignment & Authority Control

layers.description: Protects keys/tokens; prevents secret exfiltration and unsafe config.
layers.name: Secrets & Key Management

layers.description: Authoritative listing of agents, versions, capabilities, entitlements.
layers.name: Agent Registry & Metadata

layers.description: Authoritative listing of apps, endpoints, UI surfaces, and owners.
layers.name: App Registry & Surface Governance

layers.description: Tracks runs, inputs/outputs, versions, and reproducible verification.
layers.name: Run Registry & Reproducibility

layers.description: Hashes, signatures, verification endpoints, artifact attestations.
layers.name: Verification & Attestation

layers.description: Core compliance gates (privacy, records, program rules) by policy.
layers.name: Compliance Controls

layers.description: Health, metrics, tracing, alerts, dashboards for operations.
layers.name: Observability & Monitoring

layers.description: Controls deploys, migrations, rollbacks, version pinning.
layers.name: Change Control & Releases

layers.description: Schema validation, contract checks, input validation across systems.
layers.name: Data Integrity & Validation

layers.description: Isolation, quarantine, rollback; prevents lateral failure propagation.
layers.name: Containment & Blast Radius Control

layers.description: System/agent kill switches, circuit breakers, emergency disable controls.
layers.name: Kill Switch & Emergency Stops

layers.description: Approval gates for sensitive actions; prevents full autonomy drift.
layers.name: Human-in-the-Loop Controls

layers.description: Redaction, minimization, and privacy-safe exports and views.
layers.name: Privacy Controls

layers.description: Controls exports/integration contracts and partner access.
layers.name: Data Sharing & Interop Governance

layers.description: Maps outputs to fundable standards and reporting requirements.
layers.name: Standards & Funding Alignment

layers.description: Controls orchestration, routing, sequencing, and tool usage boundaries.
layers.name: Orchestrator & Workflow Governance

layers.description: Automates routine work safely; prevents automation from bypassing rules.
layers.name: Efficiency & Automation Controls

layers.description: Predictive analytics governance; prevents misleading or unsafe predictions.
layers.name: Prediction & Insight Controls

layers.description: Controls reporting, export formats, redaction, and approval rules.
layers.name: Reporting & Exports Governance

layers.description: Contract tests, CI gates, schema parity checks, release hard gates.
layers.name: Quality Assurance & Testing Gates

layers.description: Playbooks, escalation paths, evidence capture, and response timelines.
layers.name: Incident Response & Escalation

layers.description: Controls partner access, vendor risk, and contract obligations.
layers.name: Partner & Vendor Governance

layers.description: Controls billing, grants, ledger proofs, and separation of funds.
layers.name: Financial Controls & Ledger Integrity

layers.description: Licensing, billing scope, entitlements for paid modules and partners.
layers.name: Marketplace & Licensing Controls

layers.description: Hardening: least privilege, defense-in-depth, secure-by-default invariants.
layers.name: Military-Integrity Security Layer
